org.fcrepo.http.commons

Class AbstractResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthzEndpoint, DublinCoreGenerator, FedoraContent, FedoraDatastreams, FedoraExport, FedoraFieldSearch, FedoraFixity, FedoraIdentifiers, FedoraImport, FedoraNodes, FedoraRepositoriesProperties, FedoraRepositoryBackup, FedoraRepositoryNamespaces, FedoraRepositoryRestore, FedoraRepositoryWorkspaces, FedoraSitemap, FedoraStoragePolicy, FedoraTransactions, FedoraTransform, FedoraVersions, FedoraWebhooks, RSSPublisher, TokenEndpoint

    public abstract class AbstractResource
extends Object
    Abstract superclass for Fedora JAX-RS Resources, providing convenience fields and methods.
    Author:
    ajs6f
